title: Cutly – Account & Data Deletion
lead: How to delete your Cutly account and personal data
intro: You can delete your Cutly account in one of the following ways:

1.title: Option 1: Inside the app
1.p1: Open the Cutly app → Settings → Delete account.
1.p2: Your account and all associated personal data will be permanently deleted.

2.title: Option 2: Via email request
includeItems: The email address used for registration
A short confirmation that you want to delete your account

retention.title: Data retention:
items: All personal data is deleted immediately or within 30 days.
No data is kept after deletion, except where legally required.
